def zoom_and_center_to(self, new_width_seconds: float) -> None:
        """Zoom the plot to a fixed width centered on the current view."""
        cur = self.get_x_limits()
        half = new_width_seconds / 2
        self.set_x_limits(cur.middle - half, cur.middle + half)

def set_x_limits(self, start_seconds: float, end_seconds: float) -> None:
        if start_seconds >= end_seconds:
            rich.print(f"Invalid x limits: start_seconds ({start_seconds}) >= end_seconds ({end_seconds})")
            return
        self.ax.set_xlim(start_seconds, end_seconds)
        self.toggle_zoom_level_elements()

def zoom_to_gap(self, window: GapWindow | None) -> None:
        if window is None:
            return
        # fixed zoom level with gap centered (not full window, just the gap of silence)...
        middle = (window.gap.start_seconds() + window.gap.end_seconds()) / 2
        width_seconds = 2  # fixed width in seconds
        self.set_x_limits(middle - width_seconds / 2, middle + width_seconds / 2)
